title: Pixel 2 Forgot all Bluetooth Devices
content:
I'm not exactly sure what might have caused this, but my phone no longer has any "Previously connected devices." I listen to audiobooks every day in my car, so this morning when I tried to start listening again, it wouldn't pair because it forgot all bluetooth pairings. Has this happened to anyone before? 

I have tried restarting bluetooth and restarting my phone, but it looks like they are permanently gone. The only thing I can think of that may have lead to this is that my phone mysteriously turned itself off the night before while at 9% battery so maybe something malfunctioned there?
